# Creating City Plants Partner Planting Boundaries
```{r Load LA City Outline}
la_cd_outline <- st_read(dsn = "data/LA_City_Council_Districts_(Adopted_2012).kml") %>% 
  st_union()

la_city_outline <- st_read(dsn = "data/City_Boundary.kml") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "City of LA Outline") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

tmap_mode("plot") +
tm_shape(la_city_outline) +
  tm_polygons()
```

```{r Create LACC_ELA Area}
# Create first portion of LACC ELA
lacc_rough <- st_read(dsn = "data/LACC.kml", layer = "LACC") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

lacc_ela_main <- st_intersection(la_city_outline, lacc_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "LACC_ELA")
  
la_city_outline_removed <- st_difference(la_city_outline, lacc_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")


# Add in South LA portion of LACC ELA
lacc_ela_sla_rough <- st_read(dsn = "data/LACC_ELA.kml") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

lacc_ela_sla <- st_intersection(la_city_outline_removed, lacc_ela_sla_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "LACC_ELA")

lacc_ela <- st_union(lacc_ela_main, lacc_ela_sla) %>% 
  select("geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "LACC_ELA", .before = "geometry")

la_city_outline_removed <- st_difference(la_city_outline_removed, lacc_ela_sla_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

tm_shape(lacc_ela) +
  tm_polygons()

tm_shape(la_city_outline_removed) +
  tm_polygons()
```

```{r Create LACC_Valley Area}
lacc_valley_rough <- st_read(dsn = "data/LACC_Valley.kml") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

lacc_valley <- st_intersection(la_city_outline_removed, lacc_valley_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "LACC_Valley")

la_city_outline_removed <- st_difference(la_city_outline_removed, lacc_valley_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

tm_shape(lacc_valley) +
  tm_polygons()

tm_shape(la_city_outline_removed) +
  tm_polygons()
```

```{r Create KYCC Area}
kycc_rough <- st_read(dsn = "data/KYCC.kml") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

kycc <- st_intersection(la_city_outline_removed, kycc_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "KYCC")

la_city_outline_removed <- st_difference(la_city_outline_removed, kycc_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

tm_shape(kycc) +
  tm_polygons()

tm_shape(la_city_outline_removed) +
  tm_polygons()
```

```{r Create NET Area}
# Create first portion NET Watts Area
net_watts_rough <- st_read(dsn = "data/NET_Watts.kml") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

net_watts <- st_intersection(la_city_outline_removed, net_watts_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "NET")

la_city_outline_removed <- st_difference(la_city_outline_removed, net_watts_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")


# Adding in full NET Area
net_rough <- st_read(dsn = "data/NET.kml") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

net_main <- st_intersection(la_city_outline_removed, net_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "NET")

net <- st_union(net_main, net_watts) %>% 
  select("geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "NET", .before = "geometry")

la_city_outline_removed <- st_difference(la_city_outline_removed, net_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

tm_shape(net) +
  tm_polygons()

tm_shape(la_city_outline_removed) +
  tm_polygons()
```

```{r Create HLABT Areae}
hlabt_rough <- st_read(dsn = "data/HLABT.kml") %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

hlabt <- st_intersection(la_city_outline_removed, hlabt_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry") %>% 
  mutate(Name = "HLABT")

la_city_outline_removed <- st_difference(la_city_outline_removed, hlabt_rough) %>% 
  select("Name", "geometry")

tm_shape(hlabt) +
  tm_polygons()

tm_shape(la_city_outline_removed) +
  tm_polygons()
```

```{r Create TreePeople Area}
tp <- la_city_outline_removed %>% 
  mutate(Name = "TreePeople")

tm_shape(tp) +
  tm_polygons()
```

```{r Combine Partner Areas into One Dataframe}
city_plants_partner_boundaries <- rbind(lacc_ela, lacc_valley, net, kycc, hlabt, tp)

tm_shape(city_plants_partner_boundaries) +
  tm_polygons(col = "Name")
```

```{r Save Partner Boundaries to ShapeFile}
st_write(city_plants_partner_boundaries, "flattened_maps/City_Plants_Partner_Planting_Boundaries.shp", append = FALSE)

st_write(city_plants_partner_boundaries, "flattened_maps/City_Plants_Partner_Planting_Boundaries.kml", append = FALSE)
```






## Mapping the Areas

```{r Create LA Base Map, warning = FALSE}
bbox_poly = st_polygon(list(rbind(c(-118.735904, 34.349321), #left, top
                                  c(-118.735904, 34.349321), #right, top
                                  c(-118.152680, 33.704487), #right, bottom
                                  c(-118.152680, 33.704487), #left, bottom
                                  c(-118.735904, 34.349321))) #left, top
                       )

LA_zoom <- osm.raster(st_bbox(st_sfc(bbox_poly, 
                                     crs = 4326)))
```

```{r, Mapping Partner Areas}
tmap_mode("view") +
  tm_shape(LA_zoom) +
  tm_rgb() +
  tm_shape(city_plants_partner_boundaries) +
  tm_fill(col = "Name", alpha = 0.4) +
  tm_borders(col = "black", alpha = 0.5)
```
